title: Eight months to Mars
creator_credit: United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: This film shows the problems encountered in sending Mariner IV 325 million miles through space to explore Mars. Designed to inform the layperson in terms which will be understood, the film also explains scientific readings and photographs from Mariner IV. Narrated by John Fitch.
